text: sing thi xyu nı brrda chan fa læa sing thi xyu nı phændin nan pen siththi khx ngxallxh læa tha hak phwk cea peidphey sing thi xyu nı cı khxng phwk cea hrux pkpid man wi ktam xallxh ca thrng na sing nan ma chara sxbswn kæ phwk cea læw phraxngkh ca thrng xphaythosʹ kæ phu thi phraxngkh thrng prasngkh læa xallxh nan pen phuthrng dechanuphaph henux thuksingthukxyang
